Room.Name: Dark Tunnel
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a tunnel that is quite dark. The walls are dry to the touch.
Room.LongDescription: The air is stale and the humidity is very low. Every sound of your moves seems to be magnified in this silent tunnel. The tunnel apparently runs to the south, and deep under the castle. The floor seems to be heavy marble and the walls are great pieces of quarried granite stone.
